name: Nail-It
description:
I made this game for the Mini Jam 87.  It was my first game jam so yeah, hope it went well. Enjoy!

You will play as Bob. Bob is construction worker and a famous pacifist. Bob discovered that an old construction site is being used to store guns and ammunitions for the war in his country. Wanting to take the matters in his own hands, Bob started to destroy the crates that contain the supplies for the army, using his trusty nail gun. Bob is also a complete idiot, and sometimes he destroys the crates, containing food and medicines, that are destined to the nearby shelter for homeless people. Help Bob maintain the peace and protect the supplies for the shelter.

Use the left and right arrows to move Bob.
